title: "In a Future Driven by Artificial Intelligence, “Career Adjacency” Offers Humans Agency"
excerpt: "However trendy this new semantic shift, the word is more relevant than ever: “Career adjacency” is now the future of human work. The shift also offers reassurance to those who envision a bleak future in which artificial intelligence (AI) has eliminated virtually all jobs outside the tech industry."
